product_specification.Additional Features: Skype, Evernote, Accuweather, Norton Mobile Security, Kingsoft Office, Route 66 Navi + Maps, SHAREit, SYNCit, Usage Time Upto 8 hrs
product_specification.Sales Package: User Guide, Warranty Card, USB Cable, Tablet, Travel Power Adaptor
product_specification.USP: 7 inch Touchscreen, Android v4.2 OS, 1.3 GHz Processor, 2 MP Primary Camera
product_specification.Other Camera Features:
Primary Camera: Fixed Focus
Secondary Camera: Fixed Focus

product_description.Display: Designed with a 7 inch capacitive display with a resolution of 1024 x 600 pixels, the A7-30 Tab provides a rich and vivid viewing experience both indoors as well as outdoors. The screen features a twisted nematic display technology for faster response while watching sports and playing games.
product_description.Quad Core Processing: Powered by a 1.3 GHz MTK 8382 Quad Core processor, the A7-30 provides efficient functioning while you multitask or play games. It operates on the Android 4.2 Jelly Bean platform for a fluid user interface and can be upgraded to Android Kitkat 4.4 as well. The device is integrated with a RAM of 1 GB to aid the performance.
product_description.Camera: Capture all those special moments and video chat with your loved ones using this Lenovo Tab. The device comes with a 2 megapixel primary camera and a 0.3 megapixel secondary camera.
product_description.Pocket Size Comfort: Take this Tab with you wherever you go; built with a 10mm slim profile and weighing just 327g, the A7-30 can be easily slid into your pocket. The device is easy to hold and operate making it convenient for you to watch videos and play games on the go.
product_description.Superior Sound Experience: Experience a rich and immersive sound experience with the Lenovo Tab A7-30. Designed with dual front facing stereo speakers that are spaced well apart, the device provides enhanced stereo sound effects. The Tab is integrated with Dolby® audio enhancement for natural and distortion-free sound even while using headphones.
product_description.Storage: The Lenovo Tab is built with an internal storage space of 8 GB which can be expanded to a maximum of 32 GB using a microSD card to store all your music, videos and pictures.
product_description.Complete Connectivity: The Lenovo Tab comes with 2G internet and voice calling facility that keeps you connected all along. Integrated with Wi-Fi and Wi-Fi Hotspot, you can browse the net effortlessly and connect other supported devices to access the internet. The device also comes with Bluetooth v4 for transferring data and a micro USB port for charging.
product_description.Long Battery Life: Powered by a 3500 mAh Lithium Polymer battery, this Lenovo Tab can last up to 8 hours while browsing using the Wi-Fi on a single battery charge. It provides up to 336 hours of standby time.
product_description.GPS and Phone Functionality: Navigating your way through a new place is no more a task since this Lenovo Tab comes with a built-in Assisted-GPS along with Google Maps.

review:
Good tab at low price.

Pros-
1) Good battery backup. 6hrs of continuous use.
2) hardly any lag. thanks to quad core 1.3Ghz processor and 1G RAM.
3) upgradable to Android kitkat 4.4.2.

Cons-
1) Screen resolution is very poor. My laptop has same resolution of 1024×600 but its much more clear and readable than this tab.
2) Screen is not anti glare. I always see reflection.
3) Display is not IPS. Viewing angles are bad.
4) Camera quality is very poor.
5) Head set mic is not supported in voice call.
6) Touch is not smooth. sometime It doesn't recognize touch which is irritating.

this tab is good for this price.
I bought it for reading books. but i think IPS display and minimum screen resolution of 720p is a must for a tab.
I read that this tab support 3g dongle but i can't be able to connect my dongle to it.
please tell me anyone how to connect 3g dongle to it.

First I should thank flipkart for delivering the product well before delivery time.

This is a great product for such a price. The look, touch response are awesome. The weight is good and the tab is very handy. just you can hold like a book. Internal memory of 8 GB is one of the key point. Games are working very good, no question of slow / hanging...functioning is very smooth. The camera could have been much better...even though I though 2 mp its fine, the good looks of the tab deserves much better lenses. Very comfortable points for sim, memory card, charging etc.

Overall this is a very good product and if one is looking for tab below 10K, this is the best.

But dont purchase the case from flipkart, as the suggestions / prompts by the system are totally wrong and you will end up wasting money on the case.

This was my first order from flipkart and i bought the tablet after seeing the same in croma retail outlet. There the tablet looked good and display seems very nice. But the one i got from flipkaret has lines in the display. I mean you can easily see the pixels. Was always skeptical of ordering online and my doubts became reality about them shipping the refurbished or bad products. Part of the reason why their pricing is lower from others. I would request them to send a good product and not the rejected manufacturing units or refurbished ones at lower price. A 1000 rupees more won't hurt for quality. To be honest, now i think there whole pipeline is flooded with such products and due to that only, they are able to sell at a lesser price or may be the quality check needs heads up. Lenovo might be at fault too. Product delivery is great but the product itself wasn't upto the mark.

REVISION: Got a call from flipkart staff about ensuring replacement but i declined as i can live with it. But anyways Good step by their team in the right direction. I have asked them to ensure quality check from lenovo or anywhere else they are fetching their inventory. Hope the next purchase will be swift and fine. Best of luck to flipkart and all.

Excellent product .
I have compared lot of tabs but this one is excellent.
Sound very loud and clear, looks too good,
Slight heavier than other but its ok for me.
Camera is better than other with 2mp.
No partition in phone memory so U will get full 6gb inbuilt that is better than others.

Pros:
If you are looking for a low cost tab for reading books or comics then this product is great, I dont really play games or watch movies on it so i shell not comment on that. Another thing that is great about this product is the battery life. The touch screen works fine and the device looks good.

Cons:
The biggest problem I have faced with the tab is using the Internet which is a nightmare, Most of the times even though the device is connected to the wifi and the signal is strong it simply wont work and even when it is working it is generally very slow. This is really frustrating. I even tried 2g on this device which is also hopelessly slow. So if you intend to use the wifi this is not for you. Also the tab has crashed twice in the last three months I have been using it.

Thanks to Flipkart for such a superfast delivery. I ordered Lenovo A7-30 on Saturday around 4PM and next day on Sunday at 11:30PM the Flipkart guy (Nitin) was delivering it in my hands. I didn't paid any extra money for that "Next Day Delivery" (Rs. 90) but got the same experience.
Now come to the tab, after checking so many tablets on Flipkart, I ordered this Lenovo A7-30 tablet by keeping in mind that Lenovo is a leading brand in Laptops and computers and the tablet looks nicely built in product pictures.
The tab is manufactured surprisingly in Hong Kong and not in other part of China. The overall built quality and finish of the tab is very good in compare to other China manufactured tabs. The tablet is light in weight as it has a Lithium Polymer battery instead of commonly used Lithium Ion battery.
In Rs.6599, a 1.3GHz Quad Core Processor, 1GB RAM and 8GB of onboard storage is a nice deal. The tablet came with Android 4.4.2 Kitkat version preloaded. It also comes with a microSD card slot and SIM slot. I bought along a Strontium 16GB Class 10 microSD card for this tablet.
This tab supports voice calling and 2G data.I checked the voice call quality and found it satisfactory. 2G data i haven't checked yet as i have connected it with my home WiFi which runs quite fast on this tab.
This tab has a unique feature of "Dolby Sound" which enhanced the sound quality on inbuilt stereo speakers when switched on in any app.
I checked many apps on this tab and found them performing well. Thanks to the 1GB RAM and quad core processor. Games like My Talking Tom, Angry Birds, Angry Birds Go, Subway Surfer, Temple Run 2, PK etc. all ran smoothly. Playing HD videos in Youtube app freezes for few seconds in the start but normal quality video plays smoothly. I haven't yet checked the Full HD video playback in this tab.
The primary camera (2MP) quality is just ok and front camera (0.3MP) is actually poor. Being a budget tablet i ignored the camera quality at all.
The only drawback of this tab is the LCD screen. At 1024x600 the resolution is acceptable but being a TN (Twisted Nematic) LCD display, the viewing angles are poor.
One can clearly see flickering and running lines when viewing the screen from bottom angles. Lenovo made the cost down by not using IPS display in this tab.

The battery backup is very good as it has 3500mAh of capacity.

If you are looking for a budget tablet for Gaming & Internet purposes that too under 7K then Lenovo A7-30 is a best deal.
Dongle doesnt work on this. But happy with 2G internet. Average Camera resolution. Can print directly with the help of OTG USB through this using "Printershare" app.quite liked it.

The DOLBY enabled tablet is very nice to see movies which gives a kind of realistic sound...
The power feature which does not affect the eyes is very nice...
The three modes in sidebar is wonderful...
I Like this tablet very much...
Worth buying below 10k...

I noticed the issue of the screen disappearing/flickering & tablet freezing for a few seconds when using mobile data connection for browsing. the SIM card isn't making a strong contact in the slot.

The sound quality when taking calls I haven't explored that yet. When listening to music its Awesome though because of the Dolby EQ feature which can be custom adjusted.

The apps work fast enough.

The front two speakers are quite loud, very useful for call alerts & listing to music The battery life is good so far, using the lenovo power management app in power saving mode & activating optional features helps improve the battery life. You get more battery time if there is no SIM inserted in the tablet. It takes 3hrs to fully charge the tablet from 1% battery life.
I have upgraded it into KIT KAT 4.4 & its very easy to upgrade.

That's about it. The build quality seems alright, 2G connectivity is dated, so is the 2MP camera. The display is good The other features like RAM, ROM & CPU are useful. Hopefully overtime the freezing issue doesn't accelerate start happening unexpectedly more often.

Thanks to flipkart for delivering it within the given time period.

I've been using this tablet for almost 2 years now and I've not faced any issues till date. The back case has started to crack though, probably because the tablet slipped through my hands several times. And BTW, I do not use any additional case or cover for my tablet.

Pros:
- Excellent battery life. Lots of juice remaining even after continuous intensive use.
- Super performance.
- Not so bad sound as the tablet comes with Dolby.
- ZERO software or hardware issues even after two years (except the back case cracks).
- Runs vanilla android.
- 5.7 GB usable space in the internal memory storage which is impressive.
- Doesn't overheat even when running intensive games.
- Charging is quite fast. 0 to 100% in around 3 hours.
Cons:
- Bad touch responsiveness. Touch gets unresponsive most of the time and this makes it really irritating when typing, gaming etc.
- Screen is a finger print magnet. Also, there is too much glare.
- Comes with a bit of unremovable bloat.
- Very bad camera quality, both front and back.
- Build quality is very much ordinary.
- Lacks sensors. Has only the accelerometer.
- Light sensor doesn't work (I suspect that the tablet doesn't even have it although third-party apps show it).
- Proximity sensor doesn't work. It malfunctions.

Apple iPhone 5S

The Apple iPhone 5S takes the cake for being one of the most advanced smartphones of recent times. It features an amazing camera that lets you capture some great pictures and incorporates high-quality and powerful components for a superlative performance. As for the design, it pleases anyone who’s looking for a sleek and stylish phone.
Powerful Processor

The Apple iPhone 5S is equipped with a powerful A7 processor that is based on the 64-bit architecture. The A7 chip has double the capacity of the A6 chip, which means you will be able to enjoy multimedia games with complete 3D effects. This device also delivers a faster CPU performance and enables you to multitask by launching more than a couple of applications at the same time.
Motion Detecting Coprocessor

The iPhone 5S has a motion detecting coprocessor, the M7 coprocessor, that senses motion-oriented data. So when you're consulting Maps while travelling or evaluating your performance on the treadmill with the aid of workout applications, the co-processor automatically starts functioning and takes the load off the main processor. It detects when you park the car and start walking towards your destination and automatically switches from driving to walking while you are navigating. What’s more, the coprocessor recognises if the device has not been picked up for a while and reduces network usage to save on battery.
High Resolution Touchscreen

The Apple smartphone features a 4-inch Retina multi-touch screen that gives you an enhanced visual experience. It has a high screen resolution of 1136 x 640 pixels and colour depth of 16M. The contrast ratio of the display is 800:1 and it has an oleophobic coating to withstand fingerprints. These features bring your photos, movies and videos to life and displays them with utmost clarity.
Extremely Stylish

What makes this advanced smartphone from Apple distinct from other phones is its precision construction mark in a sleek glass and metal golden colour aluminium casing. A sapphire crystal is fitted on the home button as well as near the iSight camera for protecting it. The sleek and light device measures 7.6mm in thickness and is great for one-handed use. You can choose from stunning shades like gold, silver and space grey.
Keep Memories Fresh with iSight

The iPhone 5S comes with two superior cameras. The primary camera with a resolution of 8MP features the iSight technology that enables you to capture crystal clear snaps. Its burst mode feature lets you click 10 snapshots in one second and its sensor is relatively large to allow more light to pass through it. Both the white LED and amber LED deployed in the device, adjust the flash intensity and colour temperature of your picture for optimum results. You can capture panoramic shots and square pictures and even enhance your images with the help of multiple filters available in the phone. It is possible to zoom while recording a video and capture HD videos at the rate of 120 frames per second. Auto image stabilisation is another one of this iPhone’s benefits, which makes sure your images have less noise. This feature also does away with the blurring effect caused due to hand and camera shake.
Advanced Security Features

This smartphone has an exclusive fingerprint identity sensor called Touch ID, that can recognize the impression of your fingers when they are placed on the home button. This smartphone by Apple will only unlock when you place your finger on the sensor. This technology ensures that nobody else is able to use the device. In case you want anyone else to have access to the phone, you can easily save their fingerprints on it as well. It is also possible to save your fingerprint as the password for iTunes and Apple App Store, making it safe for you to purchase applications and other digital content from the app store.
FaceTime for Video Calling
